content: With the Agate Jar equipped, you will get a flat-out, moderate defense buff, which is incredibly useful early on in the game.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Agate_Jar.md', within the main section titled 'Agate Jar'.
The content is as follows:
With the Agate Jar equipped, you will get a flat-out, moderate defense buff, which is incredibly useful early on in the game.
